      • getAccountsByUser

        Returns all Accounts that have custody or joint custody with a given AppUser user.
        Parameters:
        user - the AppUser to search by.
        Returns:
        all Accounts associated with a given AppUser.

      • deposit

        public java.lang.Double deposit(java.lang.Double amount)
        Attempts to make a deposit to the current Account balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit
        Returns:
        the amount deposited, if any. Else, returns 0D.

      • withdraw

        public java.lang.Double withdraw(java.lang.Double amount)
        Withdraws amount from account and returns the amount withdrawn.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        the amount withdrawn, if any

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(java.lang.String balance,
                       java.lang.String accountType,
                       java.lang.String accountName)
        Adds an account to the AppState's Current User.
        Parameters:
        balance - the balance to initialize the account with.
        accountType - the AccountType of account.
        accountName - the user-specified name of the account.
